content.rendered:
For the first four years, the Pongamia trees are given time to grow into large, independent trees. 🌱➡️🌳

After four years, the trees are mature, and can be harvested for the first time. Harvesting is usually done manually but can also be done with machines. 🚜

After seven years, the tree is matured. From that moment on, it will provide a stable harvest yield. 🌰
